name: Paladins Sparkling Stallion Pack
description:
Show off your style with the Sparkling Stallion, the most magical mount in the Realm!

You'll also get 200 Crystals as well as a Deal of the Day Token, which will unlock a daily personalized deal whenever you want!

The Sparkling Stallion Pack Contains: The Sparkling Stallion Mount 200 Crystals 1 Deal of the Day Token
